# AVMusicTimeStampEndOfTrack

**Global Variable**

A timestamp you use to access all events in a music track through a beat range.

## Declaration

```swift
var AVMusicTimeStampEndOfTrack: Double { get }
```

## Discussion

Pass this value as the length of an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVBeatRange-c.struct] to indicate an end time beyond the last event in the track. This makes it possible to specify a beat range that includes all events starting at a particular time, up to and including the last event.

## Handling Beat Range

- **beats(forHostTime:error:)**: Gets the beat the system plays at the specified host time.
- **beats(forSeconds:)**: Gets the beat position (timestamp) for the specified time in the track.
- **AVBeatRange**

items.description: Gets the beat the system plays at the specified host time.
items.name: beats(forHostTime:error:)

items.description: Gets the beat position (timestamp) for the specified time in the track.
items.name: beats(forSeconds:)
